title: Could we change champ select pick order to previous
body:
Higher elo players pick first>Random pick order

could we get this back at the very least.

replies.body:
Not likely to happen.
The reason it was changed to being completely random is because the old method encouraged abusive behavior from the lobby.

"You're last pick, which means you're a piece of shit and bad at this game, either go support or we all report you for feeding"

Something along those lines.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HiytxEpJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-05T06:18:03.329+0000)
>
> Not likely to happen.
> The reason it was changed to being completely random is because the old method encouraged abusive behavior from the lobby.
> 
> "You're last pick, which means you're a piece of shit and bad at this game, either go support or we all report you for feeding"
> 
> Something along those lines.

I'd rather the better person get their desired role than having someone take it and them being shafted onto a role they're not as comfortable on.
You shouldn't be uncomfortable with any role at all, you should be at least moderately capable in ALL roles, otherwise don't play ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HiytxEpJ,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-06-05T10:20:40.464+0000)
>
> You shouldn't be uncomfortable with any role at all, you should be at least moderately capable in ALL roles, otherwise don't play ranked.

that's not what I said. maybe if you had fucking read what I said, you wouldn't make such a retarded fucking comment. I said not **_as_** comfortable on. AS. **AS**. _AS_. learn to fucking read.
My point still stands and yours is moot.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HiytxEpJ,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-06T01:13:54.454+0000)
>
> My point still stands and yours is moot.

"hur dur I'm right ur wrong blah blah blah"
you're actually that stupid.
people are going to be better at certain roles and worse at certain roles. the people that are better should get their desired role. the strong rule and the weak obey. that is the way the world works. having pick order determined by mmr is a much better system than having it be random. you're basically saying that you'd rather have the guy that's only been playing tennis for 1 year over the pro player as your doubles partner because he was first in line.

I agree with klavimore. It will encourage a biased opinion towards the first pick. TBH you really are matched with people who are the same skill as you so this really isn't necessary (unless you have a really high ego and think that you have a noob team and you should be in challenger or something like that).
It'd also make it easier to calculate MMR gain/losses and the consequent ladder movement. Now that MMR is hidden, it'd be sweet for the few players that understand how this works.
